programme.desc: After years of caring for a sick child, is a mother hiding a terrible secret? Accused of attempting to murder her son, she is now fighting for her freedom.

programme.title: The First 48 S23 Ep427
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old high school student is found on the stairs of an apartment filled with kids, witnesses need to tell the truth so Tulsa Homicide can get to their shooter.

programme.title: Undercover Asia S4 Ep03

programme.title: Marcia Clark Investigates S1 Ep03

programme.title: Mark of a Killer S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Texas authorities have a killer riding the rails and leaving a literal trail of bread crumbs after eating at victims' tables.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Families, friends and experts come together to tell the true-life stories of people who left for the holiday of a lifetime on a cruise ship, only to never return home.

programme.title: Street Outlaws S2 Ep17

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks S1 Ep02

programme.title: Dukes of Haggle S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Before closing his trading season, Rod battles Fred and Andy for a classic '53 Chevy truck and shocks his rivals at auction.

programme.title: Garage Squad S6 Ep06

programme.title: Overhaulin' S8 Ep02

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars S10 Ep03

programme.title: All Girls Garage S9 Ep06
programme.desc: The team brings in a stock supercharged CTS-V and converts it to twin turbos.

programme.title: Kings of Crash S1 Ep04

programme.title: Garage Squad S6 Ep09
programme.desc: When tragedy cut a family of four in half, their black 1972 Oldsmobile Cutlass convertible just faded away in their garage.

programme.title: Misfit Garage S3 Ep06

programme.desc: John Kiapos is a cool customer who's beloved AMX has taken up roots on his families ranch.

programme.title: Street Outlaws S1 Ep01

programme.desc: Richard, Aaron and the Gas Monkey gang are joined by a crazy Canadian on a lawnmower who jumps a fridge but fails to clear the clothes dryer stacked on top.

programme.title: Fourwheeler S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Larger tires on an off-road rig usually mean broken axles. A 1989 Dodge Ram Charger is in the shop.

programme.title: All Girls Garage S7 Ep06
programme.desc: In 1989 Trans Am made a turbo engine for their 20th anniversary of the car. The girls bring in one of these rare cars and knock off some wish list items for the owner.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection S2 Ep04

programme.desc: Star baseball player Kim Je-hyuk becomes a criminal overnight and has to be imprisoned. There, he meets inmates of different backgrounds, and come to know their touching stories.
